name: You Must Survive (itch)
description:
A sci-fi bullet hell with no checkpoints. The game has three levels, and each are able to be practiced with an in game practice tool. A full blind play through rarely exceeds thirty minutes.

In the game you play as a lone spaceship pilot trying to return an unknown power back to Earth in order to save humanity. The story features a few paragraphs of text and one player choice to determine the outcome.
